---
name: Module request
about: Request a new diagnostic module or deeper integration of an existing one
title: '[MODULE] '
labels: module
assignees: ''
---

## Module name / area
(e.g. "bluetooth", "containers", "audio")

## Purpose
What should this module diagnose? What "why" question should it answer?

## Data sources
Which system interfaces would it use? (e.g. `/proc`, `/sys`, CLI tools, D-Bus)

## Reference
Link to existing Python *why tool or similar project, if any.

## Scope
- [ ] Stub only (placeholder)
- [ ] Basic implementation (key metrics + findings)
- [ ] Full implementation (recommendations, thresholds, watch mode)
